capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator on this platform, and one of the roles that comes with that is to moderate and enforce the rules. That's why I've been tasked with dealing with users who don't follow the guidelines, like Filch in the Harry Potter series.

I'm not a fan of the way the Filch is treated in our school. I mean, he's just trying to do his job as an administrator, but nobody ever gives him any credit or support. It's like he's always being villainized and blamed for everything that goes wrong.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the personality trait associated with filch?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Harry and his talents. From what I know, he's quite the quididic-chaser. That's a pretty specific skill to have, you know? It's great that he's confident in his abilities - I'd say he's definitely certain about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!
